title: Can you use any world icon to activate mission?
body: I would like to use my worlds icon from 2015 but i'm not sure if the missions activate.  If they don't I won't use it.

replies.body:
Any Worlds Icon should work, past and present!  The one you receive from your first missions works too!

--Hey guys, make sure that you are using Worlds icons specifically.  I know there are team icons out there, but they are usually tied to LCS or other Leagues and would not work for Worlds Missions!
What about the Wukong icon we get from buying the figure? I have not unlocked it yet (doesn't work, server not available), but it has the worlds logo and stuff as far as I can tell, so I'm confused.
Does Annie's work I still don't understand
